description:
[Status: preview] [Name: too-many-newlines-at-end-of-file] [Message: Too many newlines at end of {domain}] What it does Checks for files with multiple trailing blank lines. In the case of notebooks, this check is applied to each cell separately. Why is this bad? Trailing blank lines in a file are superfluous. However, the last line of the file should end with a newline. Example spam(1)


 Use instead: spam(1)
